title: Shifted Magic
description: Magic. Wolves. Soulmates. Just another day. Wait…what?AndieWork, home, sleep. Rinse and repeat. That's my life and, most days, I have no complaints. Then, strangers appear out of the shadows and there isn’t anything ordinary about them.Suddenly, I’m being teleported to a witch coven that should be familiar but isn’t. And the things I’m being told, they can’t be possibly true…can they?FosterI’ve spent months searching for a mate I’m not even sure I want to find. I shouldn’t be allowed to care about another—not after what I failed to do all those years ago.Except when I see her… I know.I know who she is. I know I will destroy everything in my way of keeping her safe. Most importantly…I know she’s mine.Author’s Note: This is the fourth series in Heather Renee’s Mystics and Mayhem universe. This world is for fans of paranormal and slow burn romance, intrigue, and fast paced action. Recommended for ages 17+. Series do not need to be read in order.
author: Heather  Renee
